### Project Details

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is seeking a navigation, communication and monitoring system for scientific diving. The system will support scientific activities in the region of Mont-Joli, Quebec.

The successful vendor will provide an Underwater GPS (UGPS) positioning system that meets the requirements of Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

### Notice Contact Information

If you require more information regarding this tender notice, please contact:

*   **Name**: Simon Presse, Public Works and Government Services Canada
